name: Lesson Note Generator
description: Lesson Summary Generator is a mobile-ready, responsive web application that offers educational professionals an integrated platform where they can effortlessly create student rosters, outline detailed concepts to be covered, record homework performance, document lesson discussions, and assign future tasks with ease.
role1: Fully designed, developed, and coded all aspects of the application
role2: Integrated OpenAI to generate lesson summaries

name: Chef's Kiss
description: A full-stack app that allows users to search for restaurants in a given area, save a restaurant to a list, and add their own impressions.
role1: Wire-framed, developed, and coded the front-end infrastructure
role2: Integrated the back-end third party API with the frontend

name: Mingo
description: A minimalist, text-based app (inspired by Twitter) that allows for users to create subject-based posts and respond with comments.
role1: Served as project lead for a team of two other front-end/back-end developers
role2: Worked in both the frontend and backend as needed

name: Blackjack
description: A basic Blackjack game coded using object-oriented programming.
role1: Built a web application rendered with animations, flexbox, and grid using HTML and CSS
role2: Utilized Vanilla JS with object-oriented programming for computer interactions
